remarks: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, deduction form.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
csbied2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
csbied2.2 $e |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
csbied2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = B ) -> C = D ) $.
csbied2 $p |- ( ph -> [_ A / x ]_ C = D ) $.
$d A x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
